db.sqlite3 - Database¶

By default the Django configuration uses SQLite fo databases, which is included in Python. In the project folder there can be found this db.sqlite3 file which is exactly our database. Why we need this? We have to store all the products from the different supermarkets, and we have to describe them with their name, price and supermarket name, and have to store this data.
(Django docs: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.2/intro/tutorial02/)
